name: 汪建民
objective:
介紹材料的結構及其電性質--半導體物性、光學性質--LED和磁性質，包括 1.晶體結構與晶體化學 2.材料的能帶結構與半導體物性3.太陽能電池原理 4.材料的光電效應與LED原理 5.光、電、磁場對材料的影響等。 
This course is a special topic of Optical, Electrical and Magnetic Properties of Energy-related Materials, including: 1. Crystal structure and crystal chemistry; 2. Band structure and semiconductor physics; 3.Solar cell principle; 5. Optoelectronic effects and LEDs; 6. Effects of optical, electric, and magnetic fields on energy-related materials.
schedule:
Chapter I: Renewable Energy & Solar Potential
  (再生能源與太陽能之展望)
Chapter II: Crystal Chemistry and Crystallography
  (晶體化學和結晶學)
Chapter III: Electrical Property--Semiconductor and Solar Cell 
  (材料電性和太陽能電池)
Chapter IV: Optoelctronic Effects--Light-Emitting Diodes 
  (材料光電性和LED, 發光二極體)
��　　Chapter V: Magnetic Property--Nano-bits Media for Tera-world   (材料磁性和磁記錄中的奈米世界)
